channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: North Dakota lawmaker dies at 54 following cancer battle
item.description: A lawmaker who was North Dakota’s youngest state senator when he was elected at 24 has died at 54, a year after he began treatment for cancer. Republican state Rep.

item.title: A Maui County appointee oversaw grants to nonprofits tied to her family members
item.description: Two nonprofits with family ties to Luana Mahi, an economic development director for Maui Mayor Richard Bissen, won more than $1 million in county grants overseen by Mahi since she was appointed in 2023.

item.title: Chicago police chief highlights officer training as critical to Democratic convention security
item.description: Chicago’s police superintendent is touting extensive officer training as a critical part of the city’s preparations for the Democratic National Convention next week.
